main.name: Dhruv Sharma
main.description: I like cruising the open roads and think of innovative ideas that can bring real-world solutions to life
main.bio: Full stack developer, proficient in JavaScript, TypeScript, Node.js, and NestJS, with a deep understanding of domain-driven design and clean architecture principles to leverage scalability and maintain efficiency.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to be bring your exicitng idea to life!

work.title: Senior Software Engineer
work.description: Diving deep into microservices architecture and system scalability, leveraging Docker, Kubernetes, Rancher, RabbitMQ, and multi-tenant DB with Redis caching to create robust and scalable solutions.

work.title: Senior Engineer
work.description: Developed scalable backend solutions and optimized performance for supply chain data processing, handling 50,000+ concurrent users.

work.title: Full stack developer
work.description: Led end-to-end development of diverse projects, integrating payment and shipping APIs, and implementing real-time monitoring dashboards, reducing development time by 50%.

testimonials.text: Dhruv is absolutely excellent, his depth of knowledge & his mentorship really meant a lot to us... I would definitely recommend
Learning with Dhruv has been AWESOME, he makes learning React so easy and approachable, you'll finally feel like you know what's going on!
